Uses of Class
org.alljoyn.bus.Variant

Packages that use Variant
org.alljoyn.bus This package holds all of the AllJoyn code for creating and using interfaces. 
org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces This package contains various standard AllJoyn interfaces. 
 

Uses of Variant in org.alljoyn.bus
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus that return Variant
<T> Variant
ProxyBusObject.getProperty(Class<T> iface, String propertyName)
          Get a property from an interface on the remote object.
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus that return types with arguments of type Variant
<T> Map<String,Variant>
ProxyBusObject.getAllProperties(Class<T> iface)
          Get all properties from an interface on the remote object.
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus with parameters of type Variant
 void BusListener.propertyChanged(String propName, Variant propValue)
          Called by the bus when the value of a property changes if that property has annotation org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties.PropertiesChanged=true Any implementation of this function must be multithread safe.
<T> void
ProxyBusObject.setProperty(Class<T> iface, String propertyName, Variant value)
          Set a property on an interface on the remote object.
 

Uses of Variant in org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces that return Variant
 Variant Properties.Get(String iface, String propName)
          Gets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces that return types with arguments of type Variant
 Map<String,Variant> Properties.GetAll(String iface)
          Gets all properties for a given interface.
 

Methods in org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces with parameters of type Variant
 void Properties.Set(String iface, String propName, Variant value)
          Sets a property that exists on a named interface of a bus object.
 

Method parameters in org.alljoyn.bus.ifaces with type arguments of type Variant
 void DBusProxyObj.PropertiesChanged(String name, Map<String,Variant> changed, String[] invalidated)
          Signal sent when one or more properties change on an object.
